classificationCodes.maingroupTitle: testing or measuring during manufacture or treatment; reliability measurements, i.e. testing of parts without further processing to modify the parts as such; structural arrangements therefor detecting or counting or handling ; marks applied to semiconductor devices ; testing methods or structures peculiar to devices provided for in groups to , see these groups; investigating or analysing materials by the use of optical means ; testing electrical properties of individual semiconductor devices ; testing of photovoltaic systems
